goBackToConfirmDirectorsHomeAddress: Go back to 'Confirm where the director lives'
goBackToFindDirectorsHomeAddress: Go back to 'Find the director's home address'
manualHomeAddressHint: Tell us the director's home address. Only give a business address if they also live there.
manualHomeAddressPublicRegisterInformati: We will show the country the director lives in on the public Companies House register. We will not show the whole address, unless it's also used for the company's registered office address or the director's correspondence address.
